text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Early to bed, early to fangirl—— …I mean, it's 5AM early.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Good morning, Trainer-san!! And thank you… Thank you so much for coming!!!!!!
choice_data_list: Someone's in a good mood this early.
Someone's in a good mood this early.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: I sure am! Because today, we're showing our fandom by going on a "Holy Site Pilgrimage"!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Umamusume-chans each have their own life stories… Their own tales of drama and woe. Today's fangirling spree is a tour of places where these dramas made their mark.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: To be honest, I want to spend a whole month checking them out, but I still have to race! So we're gonna use every second of our day off!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Time is limited! But my love for my faves is infinite! So without further ado, let's get right to it!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Here's our first stop! Look, a farm——No, sorry, this flower field! AKA the Garden of Pwecious Rest (Open parenthesis name by Digitan close parenthesis) !

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: There's a bit of folk wisdom saying the flowers here can be used to confess the feelings that words never could.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: So many Umamusume-chans have given white clovers to the girls they call their rivals, and guess what…!!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: What's that mean in flower language?—— You guessed it! "Think of me"!! "Promise me"!! They're promising to devote all their feelings to each ooootthhheeeerrrrrr……
choice_data_list: Really does sound like a drama.
Really does sound like a drama.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: S O T R U E ! You get it! Your understanding runs as deep as the Strait of Dover～!!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: And here we are! The playground also known as The Little Racetrack of Sisterhood!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Hayahide-san fact: She used to race a lot against her little sister Brian-san when they were kids.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: The two are sisters, yet rivals too. Doesn't that backstory get you literally shaking? …Don't you just want to run!?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Well, now I've got to, don't I?!! Time to go full delulu and experience our faves through imagination! This, too, is the fangirl's path!! YEAAAAAAHHHHH!!!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Bwahhh～～～!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Yum! Yum! YUM! So this is the taste of The King's Ramen!!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Plus! …the… sheer size of these portions… woo!!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: …N-No wonder they call it the King's Ramen. One who conquers the ramen… bears the crown—— …Hough…
choice_data_list: Y-you don't have to finish the whole thing!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Nay! Far too many lives have been laid down in pursuit of this throne… I must… get a taste… of their dreams…

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Houhsfgl.
Even after that ordeal, she continued her journey with all her might. After all that——

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: ——Okay! Now that we've checked out the honey drink stall, the pilgrimage… is complete!
choice_data_list: We really went all over the place, huh.
We really went all over the place, huh.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Whew～! What a long fangirling journey it's been, for real～! Nice hustle, soldier! Salute!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: And… Hehe, I'm glad you got to enjoy yourself without getting messed up.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: To be honest, I was planning on doing this by myself like I always do, but——

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Okily dokily, finished the itinerary for my pilgrimage ☆ Muhuhuuuu. Can't wait to tell Trainer-san all about it ～♪

text_block_list.name: Umamusume Classmate
text_block_list.text: Haha, no idea what you're talking about, but you're looking as chipper as ever!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Whoa! W… Was I saying all that out loud…!? Sorry for botherin' ya, bud…!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume Classmate
text_block_list.text: Actually, you mentioned telling your trainer about your trip… So you're not going together with them? On your, uh… pilgrimage… thing?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Beh!? I- I didn't even think of that! …A pilgrimage… together…!?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Wh… Whhuwhwuhwuwhuhuhhhh～!!??

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: And here we are! I've gotta say, it was actually ssssssssssssssssssssssssu…

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: …uuuuuper duper fun～!
choice_data_list: I had fun too. Thanks for inviting me.
I had fun too. Thanks for inviting me.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Thank goodness… It was your one day off, and you had to get up super early, so I totally thought you'd say no!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Great scott! I've got the discovery of the century!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: I finally figured it out, see? The joy of fangirling together with you, Trainer-san!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: I didn't even think there was a single person on the whole planet who'd go along with my fandom so much!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: No, no, no! I'm sure you've figured out by now that I'm the type to just go off on my own all the time, yeah?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Going along with my crazy talk is one thing but, actually, really getting it!? It just makes me so happy…!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Nowadays, whenever I get all "The feels are hitting too hard I just can't even～!", I have to go talk to you about it!
choice_data_list: Anything you want to talk about, I'll listen.
Anything you want to talk about, I'll listen.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: What…!? A-a-a-a-anything!?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Are you sure? …Are you SURE?? You gave me the OK, right??? Then get ready for more of Digitan's Crazy Tal——

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: …STOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOP!!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: L-look… Over there…

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Vodka-san and Daiwa Scarlet-san!? Over there, by the bridge! Looks like they're talking…

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Ah! Is this the birth of a brand new holy site!?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: What are you doing, don't just stand there, Trainer-san! We gotta go! Dash, dash!!!!!
She ran off before I could even get a word in. If that's how it was going to be, there was nothing I could do but follow behind.
